answers.answer: There are many causes of leakage from diabetes, branch vein occlusion, uveitis, age related macular degeneration, etc.  Please discuss with your doctor.Dr. O.

question: my father in law recently went for an eye exam and they told him he had some leaking from behind the eye that it may be a sign of cateracs and no other info he is 70 yrs old is there anything else we should be concerned about
title: leaking frome behind the eye
